title: Normals really need an option to allow for longer queue times
body:
In the past 15 games (including dodges), I've gotten my main role 3 times, auto-fill 3 times, and my secondary role 9 times.

I have zero interest in playing my secondary role. This forces me to either dodge and pray that I'm not assigned my secondary role in the next game (which, statistically, I will be), or waste 20+ minutes in a game I don't want to be in.

This seriously needs to be fixed. Only getting my main role in 3/15 games is not acceptable, and just makes me not want to play League. I would rather sit in queue for a longer time and do something else on the side than deal with this bullshit.

**EDIT: I've now gotten my main role 3/18 times. This is not acceptable.**

replies.body:
The problem is in the fact that sometimes (and that might happen a lot) there is just NOT ENOUGH players for the role, that u use as secondary.
For example:
You wanted to play adc, ur secondary is support.
If you got autofilled, that means that both adc and support were taken by people, who already WERE autofilling before this game.
If you get secondary role, that means that there literally no more other players, who picked support as main role, or they just did play their secondary role as support, or they were autofilled.

You think that you are the only one, who get ur secondary roles like that, or autofilled, but EVERYONE do.

Imagine yourself that you came to a game, where EVERY SINGLE PLAYER OF YOUR TEAM autofilled last game or got their secondary role, and everyone wanted to go adc.

I just dodged my secondary role twice, queued a third time, and got it again.

I'm getting my secondary role 4x more often than my main role.

**This is fucking stupid.**

If you have a fast computer, you can play blind pick and call your role before anyone else has even loaded the lobby.

I have an old computer.

I jungle a lot more than I used to.
